member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.ExceptionHandlerExtensions.UseExceptionHandler(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a middleware to the pipeline that will catch exceptions, log them, reset the request path, and re-execute the request. The request will not be re-executed if the response has already started.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.ExceptionHandlerExtensions.UseExceptionHandler(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder})
member.summary: Adds a middleware to the pipeline that will catch exceptions, log them, and re-execute the request in an alternate pipeline. The request will not be re-executed if the response has already started.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.ExceptionHandlerExtensions.UseExceptionHandler(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.ExceptionHandlerOptions})
member.summary: Adds a middleware to the pipeline that will catch exceptions, log them, and re-execute the request in an alternate pipeline. The request will not be re-executed if the response has already started.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePages(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.StatusCodePagesOptions})
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware with the given options that checks for responses with status codes between 400 and 599 that do not have a body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePages(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.StatusCodePagesOptions)
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware with the given options that checks for responses with status codes between 400 and 599 that do not have a body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePages(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware with a default response handler that checks for responses with status codes between 400 and 599 that do not have a body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePages(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Func{Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.StatusCodeContext,System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware with the specified handler that checks for responses with status codes between 400 and 599 that do not have a body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePages(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware with the specified response body to send. This may include a '{0}' placeholder for the status code. The middleware checks for responses with status codes between 400 and 599 that do not have a body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePagesWithRedirects(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware to the pipeline. Specifies that responses should be handled by redirecting with the given location URL template. This may include a '{0}' placeholder for the status code. URLs starting with '~' will have PathBase prepended, where any other URL will be used as is.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePages(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder})
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware to the pipeline with the specified alternate middleware pipeline to execute to generate the response body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware to the pipeline. Specifies that the response body should be generated by re-executing the request pipeline using an alternate path. This path may contain a '{0}' placeholder of the status code.
